name: The War is Over
description:
Hey guys this game was made along with mattabulous as we competed in creating a game within less than a week on a random theme. I really enjoyed this process and I really suggest that you watch mine and Matt's video.

Mine video:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RJA8jIU8vbc&feature=youtu.be

Matt's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=notz73NdFsg&t=332s

------------------------------------------------------------ To finish the game kill all the enemies and collect the key. ---------------------------------------------

Controls:

space - to skip or speed up dialogue

WASD - move the player

Left Click - Shoot

Scroll Wheel - Change weapons

when walking up to a chest ammo will be given to the player depending on what gun the player is holding that is the ammo he would get. 

E.g. if your holding the assault rifle and you interact with a chest you will receive assault rifle ammo

Health packs heal for 10 hp. but if you have more than 90hp you can still pick them up.
